name: arxiv_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on arXiv in parallel.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('li.arxiv-result').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 5) { const titleEl = el.querySelector('p.title'); const idEl = el.querySelector('.list-title a[href*="/abs/"]'); const authorsEl = el.querySelector('p.authors'); results.push({ title: titleEl?.textContent?.replace('Title:', '')?.trim() || '', arxiv_id: idEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: idEl?.href || '', authors: authorsEl?.textContent?.replace('Authors:', '')?.trim() || '' }); } }); return { result_count: results.length, results };
detailSteps.name: results
